scripts.deploy: yarn export && arweave deploy ./out/index.html --package --key-file arweave.json --force-skip-confirmation && arweave deploy ./out/ar.html --package --key-file arweave.json --force-skip-confirmation && arweave deploy ./out/price.html --package --key-file arweave.json --force-skip-confirmation && arweave deploy ./out/volume.html --package --key-file arweave.json --force-skip-confirmation
